__e: But, I really felt as if I were floating above the ground, not walking, and I could do things: I'd go out to the highway and watch the lights go from red to green and think: "How wonderful!"
I'm gonna jog up the highway and get some gasoline.
I made my way up to the road and I began to feel the pain in my side and leg.
